pull.title: [0.17] Release preparations for 0.17.2
pull.body:
Initial preparations for a 0.17.2 release. Needs a look over by laanwj (especially translations). Also need to check that everyone that should be included in the release notes has been included.

#15445 is the last open [0.17.2 milestone](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Apr+milestone%3A0.17.2) tagged PR. I'm not sure that it's a requirement though.

events.body: If possible, I'd like to include #16639
Concept ACK, haven't checked the translation changes in detail but looks good to me on first glance

events.body:
Translations for 0.17 cleaned and updated on transifex.
Be advised, some translations were merged. There were also some translations which were just duplicates and didn't add anything when merging them. The result is less language files, which are in turn more complete.

p.s. I'd still like to further tidy up the translation on transifex, but i'm waiting for laanwj's answer. It's a mess with duplicates everywhere, and translations for locales instead of languages in some cases. Cleaning up further for 0.17 and 0.18 would only make a bigger mess on transifex since I can't move 0.14, 0.15 and 0.16 versions around.

tree d85009c7cf3405da5c4c836953687bf2b4f84fd7
parent 6b42df88ce1398042162bfe6dafc9f555f4f7b59
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1566021250 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1566866113 +0800

doc: update release notes for 0.17.2

events.body:
I've updated this to pull the latest Transifex changes for `0.17`.

> Cleaning up further for 0.17 and 0.18 would only make a bigger mess on transifex since I can't move 0.14, 0.15 and 0.16 versions around.

I'd suggest just concentrating on the upcoming 0.19 release. "Cleaning up" anything more for 0.17 and even 0.18 is going to be low impact

> "Cleaning up" anything more for 0.17 and even 0.18 is going to be low impact

I'm well aware of that, I wasn't going to clean the older translations, just move some of them from locales to languages - since I can't do that, moving languages around can make a mess on transifex. Languages which appeared to be complete (100% translated in every branch) would then be only ~80% translated, even though 017x and 018x would be at 100%. I'd rather move all translations together, so that the older translations stay on transifex as examples.

///

I took a quick look at the translations, it seems that the _bitcoin_si.ts_ is wrong - the translations are in another language. I already fixed it on transifex. Please either remove the file or pull the translations from transifex again if it's not too much work.

>  since I can't move 0.14, 0.15 and 0.16 versions around.

Please don't spend time on those versions, their translations will never end up in a release anymore. Only the last two major releases have active translation, and I agree with @fanquake that it only makes sense to focus on the latest release (now 0.18, translations will open for 0.19 in a few days) for major changes.

> but i'm waiting for laanwj's answer

Sorry, answer to what are you waiting for?

@laanwj sorry if I wasn't clear enough. I'm not spending time on 0.14 - 0.16.
I'd just like to tidy up translations on transifex and move translations from locales to languages ((cs_CZ) to (cs) for example), because we don't need a locale for czech language.
To do this in a clean way, I'd also have to move 0.14-0.16 translations around (or just delete them), which I can't at the moment.

I was asking you for permissions/credentials to do that, but I can't exactly remember when and where.
I've also sent you a message on transifex a while ago, asking for coordinator/reviewer role for slovenian language (si) and (si_SI) (account name _gasper.cefarin_).

I've already done a lot of cleaning and some reorganizing on traqnsifex- you'll see the bump in edited/translated words on transifex dashboard for August.
I've managed to remove the 0.14-0.16 resources. As for the other questions, see #16754.
